member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Defines a resource texture when the original resource texture is created.

member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES.extents
member.summary: The extents of the resource table in each dimension.

member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES.dimensions
member.summary: The number of dimensions in the resource texture. This must be a number from 1 to 3.

member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES.bufferPrecision
member.summary: The precision of the resource texture to create.

member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES.channelDepth
member.summary: The number of channels in the resource texture.

member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES.filter
member.summary: The filtering mode to use on the texture.

member.name: D2D1_RESOURCE_TEXTURE_PROPERTIES.extendModes
member.summary: Specifies how pixel values beyond the extent of the texture will be sampled, in every dimension.
